ns0:entry.ns0:title: Continuum-wise expansive Non-Autonomous Discrete Systems
ns0:entry.ns0:summary: In this paper, we study continuum-wise expansive non-autonomous discrete dynamical systems. We discuss various properties of such non-autonomous systems. We further obtain results for cw-expansive non-autonomous systems with shadowing property and obtain an important equivalence. \keywords{Non-autonomous dynamical systems, continuum-wise expansive, shadowing property
ns0:entry.ns1:comment: Some results may not be correct
